abstract.t: This document presents a binary IP-based protocol to facilitate interoperable communications between avionics equipment. The protocol is UDP-based, stateless, and broadcast. Messages consist of a common header followed by a series of parameters and related attributes. The parameters are always informational, e.g., indicating airspeed is 150 kts, but parameter attributes can be set to indicate intent, e.g., this parameter contains a new user selected value such as an instruction that deploys the landing gear.
